'''Fosco Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

== History ==
Fosco was the son of [[Largo Baggins]] and [[Tanta Hornblower]]. He married [[Ruby Bolger]], and had three children: [[Dora Baggins|Dora]], [[Drogo Baggins|Drogo]] and [[Dudo Baggins|Dudo]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref> Fosco is the grandfather of [[Frodo Baggins]].
